text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَعِلۡمٞ لِّلسَّاعَةِ فَلَا تَمۡتَرُنَّ بِهَا وَٱتَّبِعُونِۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ
translation: 61. isagu (Ciise iyo soo degitaanki) waa calaamad (muujin soo dhowaanshaha) Saacadda (Qiyaame), ee ha ka shakiyina arrinkeeda ee i soo raaca17: Kan baa ah Jid Toosan.
footnotes: 17. Waa raaca hanuunka iyo shareecada Alle (Islaamka).
